GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object matching the given article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects matching the given article_id

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts a comment object to be posted relating to the given article_id

comment.body: Bemused of Basingstoke. What is this guy on?
Bemused of Basingstoke. What is this guy on?
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts a newVote object specifying by how much to increment the votes for the given article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment with given comment_id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
